hooks.command: echo [AIDD Protocol] You MUST call aidd_start now. Store the returned session ID. Follow the AIDD conversation lifecycle in CLAUDE.md. You MUST call aidd_session with action end before this conversation closes.

echo [AIDD Protocol] Context was compacted or session resumed. If you lost the session ID, recover it with aidd_session { action: list, status: active }. Continue following AIDD lifecycle protocol from CLAUDE.md.
echo [AIDD Protocol] Context compaction imminent. If you have pending session state (decisions, files modified, tasks completed), call aidd_session { action: update } NOW before context is lost.
echo [AIDD Protocol] Before ending: you MUST call aidd_session with action end and provide outcome { testsPassing, complianceScore, reverts, reworks } if you have not already.
